snippet.title: Legend of Zelda Majora's Mask Space World 1999 Trailer
snippet.description:
http://www.zeldadungeon.net/
This very first glimpse of The Legend of Zelda Majora's Mask was shown at the 1999 Nintendo video game trade show known as Space World. 

Initially, the game was referred to as Zelda Gaiden, and it wasn't until early 2000 where the official title of Majora's Mask was revealed.

Video originally from IGN, http://www.ign.com/
